oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Songbook that belonged to Andrew W. Hunt Jr., Co. A, 11th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Songbook of Andrew W. Hunt Jr., Co. A, 11th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA. Hunt wrote his own lyrics on the backs of several sheets of music. He served as a musician and clerk in quartermaster' department. He transferred to the 11th Tenn. band in March 1863.; He was born March 17, 1839, in Williamson County, Tenn. was the son of Andrew W. Hunt (January 12, 1816-April 2, 1861) and Sue Ann Nichols (October 7, 1820-November 14, 1901). He died on May 27, 1926, in Bloomfield, Missouri.
